task.title: Create chamfer
task.shortdesc: Using CHAMFER creates chamfers for the adjacent planes. While creating fillets, the system prompts you to specify a distancefor the first and second object. The first object is the base plane and the second one is another plane.

context.p: After specifying the chamfer distance, you have to select edges to fillet. You can select all edges of the base plane byselecting an edge using Loop option. Get more details fromthe CHAMFER command.

step.cmd: Choose Modify > Chamfer from the mainmenu.
Select the edge of the base surface to chamfer.

info.p: To select a different surface, type N (Next) and press Enter. To use the current surface, press Enter.

step.cmd: Specify the distance on first entity.
Specify the distance between second entity.
To select all edges aroundthe base surface, type L (Loop) and press Enter.
